cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bougai

sentence.kanji: 彼に営業を妨害されました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni eigyou wo bougai saremashita
sentence.english: My business operations were thwarted by him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seibutsu

sentence.kanji: 海の底には不思議な生物がたくさんいるよ。
sentence.romaji: umi no soko ni ha fushigi na seibutsu ga takusan iru yo
sentence.english: There are a lot of strange creatures at the bottom of the sea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suteki

sentence.kanji: 素敵なプレゼントをありがとう。
sentence.romaji: suteki na purezento wo arigatou
sentence.english: Thank you for the wonderful gift.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dansei

sentence.kanji: 彼は素敵な男性です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha suteki na dansei desu
sentence.english: He's a wonderful man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jousei

sentence.kanji: 私は世界情勢を知るために毎日ニュースを見るわ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha sekai jousei wo shiru tame ni mainichi nyu-su wo miru wa
sentence.english: I watch the news everyday to know about world affairs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bou

sentence.kanji: この棒は何に使うのですか。
sentence.romaji: kono bou ha nani ni tsukau no desu ka
sentence.english: What do you use this stick for?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seijitsu

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても誠実な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo seijitsu na hito desu
sentence.english: He is a very honest person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nageku

sentence.kanji: 嘆いていても何も変わりません。
sentence.romaji: nageiteite mo nani mo kawarimasen
sentence.english: Grieving won't change anything.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuujitsu

sentence.kanji: 犬は飼い主に忠実です。
sentence.romaji: inu ha kainushi ni chuujitsu desu
sentence.english: Dogs are faithful to their owner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komugi

sentence.kanji: 小麦は色々な食べ物に使われている。
sentence.romaji: komugi ha iroiro na tabemono ni tsukawarete iru
sentence.english: Wheat is used in many foods.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's komugiko

sentence.kanji: うどんは小麦粉から作られます。
sentence.romaji: udon ha komugiko kara tsukuraremasu
sentence.english: Udon noodles are made from flour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oomugi

sentence.kanji: 大麦はビールの原料になります。
sentence.romaji: oomugi ha bi-ru no genryou ni narimasu
sentence.english: Barley is one of the ingredients for beer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mugi

sentence.kanji: この畑では麦を作っています。
sentence.romaji: kono hatake de ha mugi wo tsukute imasu
sentence.english: We're growing wheat in this field.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's namagusai

sentence.kanji: まな板が生臭いです。
sentence.romaji: manaita ga namagusai desu
sentence.english: The chopping board smells fishy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koseki

sentence.kanji: 結婚すると新しい戸籍が作られます。
sentence.romaji: kekon suru to atarashii koseki ga tsukuraremasu
sentence.english: A new family register is made when a couple marry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shibafu

sentence.kanji: 芝生がよく手入れされていますね。
sentence.romaji: shibafu ga yoku teire sarete imasu ne
sentence.english: The lawn is well-maintained.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gisei

sentence.kanji: 多くの人が災害の犠牲になったの。
sentence.romaji: ooku no hito ga saigai no gisei ni nata no
sentence.english: A lot of people lost their lives in the disaster.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noriokureru

sentence.kanji: 寝坊して新幹線に乗り遅れたよ。
sentence.romaji: nebou shite shinkansen ni noriokureta yo
sentence.english: I overslept and missed the Shinkansen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seimei

sentence.kanji: あなたの姓名を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: anata no seimei wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me your full name.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sei

sentence.kanji: 結婚して姓が変わりました。
sentence.romaji: kekon shite sei ga kawarimashita
sentence.english: I got married and changed my family name.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dousei

sentence.kanji: 日本では夫婦同姓が一般的よ。
sentence.romaji: nipon de ha fuufu dousei ga ipanteki yo
sentence.english: It's common in Japan for a married couple to have the same family name.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norikosu

sentence.kanji: 居眠りして降りる駅を乗り越した。
sentence.romaji: inemuri shite oriru eki wo norikoshita
sentence.english: I dozed off and ending up going past my station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suichoku

sentence.kanji: 彼らは垂直のがけを登り始めたの。
sentence.romaji: karera ha suichoku no gake wo noborihajimeta no
sentence.english: They began to climb a vertical cliff.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ogamu

sentence.kanji: 仏像に手を合わせて拝みました。
sentence.romaji: butsuzou ni te wo awasete ogamimashita
sentence.english: We joined our hands together and prayed at the statue of Buddha.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haiken

sentence.kanji: あなたの著書を拝見しました。
sentence.romaji: anata no chosho wo haiken shimashita
sentence.english: I read your book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seikaku

sentence.kanji: 僕と姉の性格は正反対です。
sentence.romaji: boku to ane no seikaku ha seihantai desu
sentence.english: My personality and my elder sister's are completely opposite.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenpou

sentence.kanji: 憲法を改正することは難しいわね。
sentence.romaji: kenpou wo kaisei suru koto ha muzukashii wa ne
sentence.english: It is difficult to revise the constitution.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shisan

sentence.kanji: 大臣の資産が公表されたね。
sentence.romaji: daijin no shisan ga kouhyou sareta ne
sentence.english: The minister's assets were made public.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishitsu

sentence.kanji: この犬は穏やかな性質だよ。
sentence.romaji: kono inu ha odayaka na seishitsu da yo
sentence.english: This dog has a calm nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishun

sentence.kanji: この曲を聞くと青春の頃を思い出します。
sentence.romaji: kono kyoku wo kiku to seishun no koro wo omoidashimasu
sentence.english: When I hear this tune I am reminded of my youth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shunbun

sentence.kanji: 春分の日は毎年3月20日頃です。
sentence.romaji: shunbun no hi ha maitoshi sangatsu hatsukagoro desu
sentence.english: The Vernal Equinox Day is about March 20th every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoujiru

sentence.kanji: 両者の間に摩擦が生じています。
sentence.romaji: ryousha no aida ni masatsu ga shoujite imasu
sentence.english: There is some friction between the two of them.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsuha

sentence.kanji: あれは実は私の勘違いでした。
sentence.romaji: are ha jitsuha watashi no kanchigai deshita
sentence.english: To tell the truth, that was my misunderstanding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umaretsuki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は生まれつき丈夫です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha umaretsuki joubu desu
sentence.english: She is healthy by nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nuu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は子供のスカートを縫ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kodomo no suka-to wo nuta n da
sentence.english: She made a child's skirt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shougai

sentence.kanji: 彼は80年の生涯を閉じました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hachijuunen no shougai wo tojimashita
sentence.english: His life of 80 years came to a close.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukemono

sentence.kanji: 祖母は漬け物を自分で作ります。
sentence.romaji: sobo ha tsukemono wo jibun de tsukurimasu
sentence.english: My grandmother makes her own pickles.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanayaka

sentence.kanji: 彼女は華やかな女性ですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hanayaka na josei desu ne
sentence.english: She's a gorgeous woman.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkin

sentence.kanji: 彼は大阪に転勤しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oosaka ni tenkin shimashita
sentence.english: He was transferred to Osaka.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jumyou

sentence.kanji: 亀の寿命は長いんだ。
sentence.romaji: kame no jumyou ha nagai n da
sentence.english: Turtles have long life spans.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuba

sentence.kanji: 彼は地面に唾を吐いたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha jimen ni tsuba wo haita yo
sentence.english: He spat on the ground.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukeru

sentence.kanji: 魚を味噌に漬けました。
sentence.romaji: sakana wo miso ni tsukemashita
sentence.english: I marinaded the fish in miso.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waribashi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は割り箸を使わず、自分の箸を使うの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha waribashi wo tsukawazu jibun no hashi wo tsukau no
sentence.english: She uses her own chopsticks rather than disposable ones.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konshuu

sentence.kanji: 今週は日本語のテストがあります。
sentence.romaji: konshuu ha nihongo no tesuto ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a Japanese test this week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyou

sentence.kanji: 今日は仕事がありません。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha shigoto ga arimasen
sentence.english: I have no work today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iru

sentence.kanji: 予約は要りません。
sentence.romaji: yoyaku ha irimasen
sentence.english: Reservations are not required.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotoshi

sentence.kanji: 今年はイタリアに旅行したい。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi ha itaria ni ryokou shitai
sentence.english: I want to travel to Italy this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ima

sentence.kanji: 彼は今、勉強しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ima benkyou shite imasu
sentence.english: He's studying now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kongetsu

sentence.kanji: 今月はとても忙しい。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu ha totemo isogashii
sentence.english: I'm very busy this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koshi

sentence.kanji: 昨日から腰が痛い。
sentence.romaji: kinou kara koshi ga itai
sentence.english: I've had a pain in my lower back since yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kirai

sentence.kanji: 私はタバコが嫌いです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tabako ga kirai desu
sentence.english: I hate cigarettes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imamade

sentence.kanji: 今までどこにいたのですか。
sentence.romaji: imamade doko ni ita no desu ka
sentence.english: Where were you until now?
